name: Spell Run
description:
Oh no! You, a wizard, have trapped yourself in a dungeon that scattered all of your spellbooks! Armed with only your fireball spell, you need to traverse the dungeon, find your lost spells, and escape!

Controls

Fireball spell - hold x for a short amount of time

Lightning spell - double-tap x QUICKLY

Bubble spell - hold x for a long amount of time (don't let go too early!)

Credits

Sfx, coding, and tiles - NotSoPro

Monster sprites - https://twitter.com/kirai_s/status/812824701533728770
